name: Lost In Voxeldise
description:
Story: In a world covered in darkness you alone have the power to save everyone. you head out to a snowy forest in search of some ruins that might hold the power to save the world.

Input method: Mouse and keyboard, Partial Controller support

Controls Mouse and keyboard:

Movement: WASD and Arrow Keys

Sprint: L/R Shift

Interact:  Left Mouse Button

Pause: Esc or P

Camera: Right Mouse Button and Mouse

Designers-  Walker McGraw,  Xavier Toney

Artists-  Bridget Faris, Rowan Nord, Tyrell Wilder

Programmers- Joseph Huskey, Josie DeRosier
